raw.description: Include raw response. Mostly used for debugging purposes

x-apideck-consumer-id.description: ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from

x-apideck-app-id.description: The ID of your Unify application

x-apideck-service-id.description: Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

department_id.description: Unique identifier of the department ID this employee belongs to.
department_id.title: Department ID

department_name.description: Name of the department this employee belongs to.
department_name.title: Department Name

direct_reports.description: Direct reports is an array of ids that reflect the individuals in an organizational hierarchy who are directly supervised by this specific employee.
direct_reports.title: Direct reports

display_name.description: The name used to display the employee, often a combination of their first and last names.
display_name.title: Display name

division_id.description: Unique identifier of the division this employee belongs to.
division_id.title: Division ID

employment_end_date.description: An End Date is the date that the employee ended working at the company
employment_end_date.title: Employee end date

sub_type.description: The work schedule of the employee.
sub_type.title: Employment sub type

type.description: The type of employment relationship the employee has with the organization.
type.title: Employment type

employment_start_date.description: A Start Date is the date that the employee started working at the company
employment_start_date.title: Employee start date

leaving_reason.description: The reason because the employment ended.

email.description: The email address of the manager.
email.title: Email address

name.description: The name of the manager, often a combination of their first and last names.
name.title: Manager name

marital_status.description: The marital status of the employee.
marital_status.title: Marital status

preferred_name.description: The name the employee prefers to be addressed by, which may be different from their legal name.
preferred_name.title: Preferred name

end_date.description: The date that the employee ended their probation period at the company.
end_date.title: Probation end date

start_date.description: The date that the employee started their probation period at the company.
start_date.title: Probation start date

source.description: When the employee is imported as a new hire, this field indicates what system (e.g. the name of the ATS) this employee was imported from.
source.title: Source

source_id.description: Unique identifier of the employee in the system this employee was imported from (e.g. the ID in the ATS).
source_id.title: Source ID

works_remote.description: Indicates if the employee works from a remote location.
works_remote.title: Remote

contact_name.description: Name of the contact person at the address

country.description: country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

county.description: Address field that holds a sublocality, such as a county

line1.description: Line 1 of the address e.g. number, street, suite, apt #, etc.

salutation.description: Salutation of the contact person at the address

string.description: The address string. Some APIs don't provide structured address data.

RowVersion.description: A binary value used to detect updates to a object and prevent data conflicts. It is incremented each time an update is made to the object.
RowVersion.title: Row version

account_name.description: The name which you used in opening your bank account.
account_name.title: Bank Account Name

account_number.description: A bank account number is a number that is tied to your bank account. If you have several bank accounts, such as personal, joint, business (and so on), each account will have a different account number.
account_number.title: Bank Account Number

bank_code.description: A bank code is a code assigned by a central bank, a bank supervisory body or a Bankers Association in a country to all its licensed member banks or financial institutions.
bank_code.title: Bank Code

branch_identifier.description: A branch identifier is a unique identifier for a branch of a bank or financial institution.
branch_identifier.title: Branch Identifier

bsb_number.description: A BSB is a 6 digit numeric code used for identifying the branch of an Australian or New Zealand bank or financial institution.
bsb_number.title: BSB Number

routing_number.description: A routing number is a nine-digit code used to identify a financial institution in the United States.
routing_number.title: Routing number

Currency.description: Indicates the associated currency for an amount of money. Values correspond to [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217).
Currency.title: Currency

Birthday.description: The date of birth of the person.
Birthday.title: Birth Date

CompanyId.description: The unique identifier of the company.
CompanyId.title: Company ID

effective_date.description: The date on which a change to an employee's compensation takes effect.
effective_date.title: Effective date

flsa_status.description: The FLSA status for this compensation.

job_id.description: The ID of the job to which the compensation belongs.
job_id.title: Job ID

rate.description: The amount paid per payment unit.
rate.title: Rate

IdOrNull.description: A unique identifier for an object.
IdOrNull.title: ID

PaymentUnit.description: Unit of measurement for employee compensation.
PaymentUnit.title: Payment Unit

Country.description: Country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.
Country.title: Country Code

CreatedAt.description: The date and time when the object was created.
CreatedAt.title: Created at (timestamp)

CreatedBy.description: The user who created the object.
CreatedBy.title: Created by

description.description: More information about the custom field
description.title: Description

id.description: Unique identifier for the custom field.
id.title: ID

CustomMappings.description: When custom mappings are configured on the resource, the result is included here.

Deleted.description: Flag to indicate if the object is deleted.
Deleted.title: Deleted

DeprecatedDepartment.description: The department the person is currently in. [Deprecated](https://developers.apideck.com/changelog) in favor of the dedicated department_id and department_name field.
DeprecatedDepartment.title: Department

Division.description: The division the person is currently in. Usually a collection of departments or teams or regions.
Division.title: Division

id.description: Unique identifier for the email address

EmployeeNumber.description: An Employee Number, Employee ID or Employee Code, is a unique number that has been assigned to each individual staff member within a company.
EmployeeNumber.title: Employee number

EmploymentStatus.description: The employment status of the employee, indicating whether they are currently employed, inactive, terminated, or in another status.
EmploymentStatus.title: Employment status

FirstName.description: The first name of the person.
FirstName.title: First name

Gender.description: The gender represents the gender identity of a person.
Gender.title: Gender

Id.description: A unique identifier for an object.
Id.title: ID

Initials.description: The initials of the person, usually derived from their first, middle, and last names.
Initials.title: Initials

compensation_rate.description: The rate of pay for the employee in their current job role.
compensation_rate.title: The compensation rate of the job.

end_date.description: The date on which the employee leaves or is expected to leave their current job role.
end_date.title: The end date of the job.

hired_at.description: The date on which the employee was hired by the organization
hired_at.title: Hired date

is_primary.description: Indicates whether this the employee's primary job.
is_primary.title: Primary

start_date.description: The date on which the employee starts working in their current job role.
start_date.title: The start date of the job.

JobRole.description: The position and responsibilities of the person within the organization.
JobRole.title: Job role

Title.description: The job title of the person.
Title.title: Job title

Language.description: language code according to ISO 639-1. For the United States - EN

LastName.description: The last name of the person.
LastName.title: Last name

WritableId.description: A unique identifier for an object.
WritableId.title: ID

Nationality.description: The nationality of the person, represented as a two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.
Nationality.title: Nationality

area_code.description: The area code of the phone number, e.g. 323
area_code.title: Area code

country_code.description: The country code of the phone number, e.g. +1
country_code.title: Country code

extension.description: The extension of the phone number
extension.title: Phone extension

id.description: Unique identifier of the phone number

PhotoUrl.description: The URL of the photo of a person.
PhotoUrl.title: Photo URL

Pronouns.description: The preferred pronouns of the person.
Pronouns.title: Pronouns

Salutation.description: A formal salutation for the person. For example, 'Mr', 'Mrs'

id.description: Unique identifier of the social link

type.description: Type of the social link, e.g. twitter

url.description: URL of the social link, e.g. https://www.twitter.com/apideck

SocialSecurityNumber.description: A unique identifier assigned by the government. This field is considered sensitive information and may be subject to special security and privacy restrictions.
SocialSecurityNumber.title: Social Security Number

Team.description: The team the person is currently in.

id.description: The unique identifier of the team.

Timezone.description: The time zone related to the resource. The value is a string containing a standard time zone identifier, e.g. Europe/London.
Timezone.title: Timezone

UpdatedAt.description: The date and time when the object was last updated.
UpdatedAt.title: Updated at (timestamp)

UpdatedBy.description: The user who last updated the object.
UpdatedBy.title: Updated by
